capabilities.name: analyze_laravel_project
capabilities.description:
This tool analyzes a Laravel project to identify changes needed for upgrading to a newer version.
    
    It scans the project structure, identifies files requiring updates, analyzes dependencies, and checks for deprecated features.

capabilities.name: analyze_laravel_file
capabilities.description:
This tool analyzes a specific file in a Laravel project to identify changes needed for upgrading to a newer version.
    
    It examines the file content and provides specific recommendations for upgrading.

capabilities.name: fetch_laravel_upgrade_guide
capabilities.description:
This tool fetches the official Laravel upgrade guide for a specific version.
    
    It retrieves the upgrade documentation and extracts key sections like dependency changes, high impact changes, etc.
